solitude.server¶

class solitude.server.RPCTestServer(executable='ganache-cli', host='127.0.0.1', port: Union[int, Tuple[int, int]] = (8545, 8545), accounts=None, blocktime=None, gasprice=20000000000, gaslimit=6721975)[source]¶

Bases: object

Wrapper around the ganache-cli executable

endpoint¶

Get endpoint :return: endpoint url string

is_alive() → bool[source]¶

Check if the ganache-cli process is running :return: True if alive

kill(timeout: float = 1.0) → None[source]¶

Forcibly kill (SIGKILL) the ganache-cli process and wait :param timeout: time to wait for ganache-cli to terminate

start(timeout: float = 15.0) → None[source]¶

Start in background :param timeout: timeout to wait for ganache-cli to respond on JSON-RPC interface

stop(timeout: float = 15.0) → None[source]¶
Terminate (SIGTERM) the ganache-cli process and wait. If this fails,
kill the process
Parameters:timeout – time to wait for ganache-cli to terminate
solitude.server.kill_all_servers()[source]¶
